Example Slideshow

This post is an example to show you how to integrate an existing slideshow.

You call simply an include with the path to the slideshow:

{% include slides.html path="/slides/2017-11-22-example-presentation" %}

As a result you get all the necessary informations to start your slides - we do the include call right now:

Open HTML presentation in a new window/tab

You need a modern browser with activated JavaScript. Navigation tips:

  • Space = Next slide
  • Shift + Space = Previous slide
  • Esc = Overview all slides
  • ? = Overview all keyboard shortcuts
  • All links are opened in a new window/tab
  • Raw HTML Version with notes
  • Raw Markdown Version

For more informations about the Reveal.js integration please see the features page here.

For a bigger example you can also have a look at this presentation from my colleague Markus Dötsch and me, which was shown by Markus on the DOAG Conference + Exhibition 2017 (in German, sorry…).

Happy presenting ;-)
Ottmar

CSCA48 Summer 2020
